resources.string: Please set a password with 12–36 characters.
You can use mnemonic phrase to import wallet or scan QR code to import.\n\nYou reset wallet password while importing the Mnemonic Phrase

Keystore is file format for private keys[JSON].\n\n Copy and paste the Keystore content to input field, or scan the QR Code generated with Keystore’s information to import.
Keystore is file format for private keys[JSON]. Click to scan Keystore QR code to import wallet

Mnemonic words can be used to recover your assets when you forget password, delete the app or lose your phone.
\n\nWe highly recommend you write the Mnemonic words (Backup Phrase) on paper and keep it in a safe place, anyone get can access or spend your assets. Please don’t save them on any cloud drive or share via the internet.

Mnemonic words can be used to import wallet or reset wallet password. If someone gets your mnemonic words, he gets all your assets directly! Please write in the Mnemonic words on paper and keep it in a safe place.\n\n
Please write down the 12 Mnemonic words in order carefully, we will verify this in the next step.
For tutorial purpose, you can only see ELF assets in A Chain
Please choose Mnemonic Phrase in correct order to confirm your mnemonic phrase backup in the previous step is correct.
We highly recommend you write the Mnemonic words (Backup Phrase) on paper and keep it in a safe place, anyone get it can access or spend your assets.

Password is used to encrypt and protect your private keys and transactions so the strength of the password is very important. AELF Wallet will not save your wallet password and get it back. So please remember your password.

Mnemonic words can be used to recover your assets when you forget password, delete the app or lose your phone.\n\nWe highly recommend you write the Mnemonic words (Backup Phrase) on paper and keep it in a safe place, anyone get can access or spend your assets. Please don’t save them on any cloud drive or share via the internet.
When turn on private mode, the assets and amount in wallet will be hidden.
Enter chain ID to search or add
We prepared an easy tutorial for you to learn quicker.
Assets from Chain 1 has arrived, please confirm.
Notice: This address only support receiving from ELF. Please don’t use other coins!
Having your mnemonic phrase means having all your wallet assets.
Please write down the mnemonic words in order on paper carefully. If your phone is lost, stolen or damaged, mnemonic words can be used to recover your assets.
Keep the mnemonic words in a secure place off-line. Please do not share or save the mnemonic words in a public network, such as email, photo albums, social apps and such.
Keep the keystore in a secure place off-line. Please do not share or save the mnemonic words in a public network, such as email, photo albums, social apps and such.
Please be sure to keep your Keystore in a safe place. If your phone is lost, stolen or damaged, the keystore can be used to retrieve your assets.
Having keystore means having all your wallet assets.
Please position QR code in frame
Please save your QR code properly. If your phone is lost, stolen or damaged, QR Code could recover your assets.
Having your private keys means having all your wallet assets.
Please write down the private key on paper carefully. If your phone is lost, stolen or damaged, private key could recover your assets.
Keep the Private Key in a secure place off-line. Please do not share or save the Private Key in a public network, such as email, photo albums, social apps and such.
Please do not save to mailbox, notepad, network disk, chat tools, etc. This may put your assets in danger
Do not transfer through network tools, once obtained by hackers will cause irreparable loss of assets. Offline devices are recommended to be transmitted by scanning qr code.
The picture does not contain a QR code!
The password should be with 12 characters.
You have not backed up your mnemonic phrases. Please bacup now! Mnemonics can be used to recover your assets in case you forget the password, accidentally delete the wallet or lose your phone.
All wallet data will be deleted after you log out. Please confirm that you have backed up your wallet.

Your wallet password will be encrypted and stored in the Keystore of your mobile device, biometrics (fingerprint or facial ) will decrypt the password for transaction execution \n\nPlease backup the password immediately after enabling biometric verification feature. To reset the password, you can reimport the wallet using Mnemonic Phrase or Private Key.

Please check on the security level of your mobile device\'s biometric verification feature. For large asset transfers, please execute by manually inputting your password. \n\nPlease refrain from enabling biometric verification for shared mobile devices

The security levels for biometric verification vary among mobile devices, user are recommended to proceed with caution. imToken will not be held liable for any risks or loss arising from vulnerabilities in the biometric verification feature.
Please set the password for lock first.
Please set up a fingerprint on your phone first
Keep the keystore in a secure place off-line. Please do not share or save the mnemonic words in a public network, such as email, photo albums, social apps and such.
Please enter the 12–36 character password, containing upper and lower case letters, characters and numbers.
The password did not conform with the rules.

Ÿ You don’t have a wallet.
 Step 1: Create a wallet
 Click “Create”.
 Step 2: Create successfully and get your Mnemonic Words
 You will get a wallet and mnemonic words after setting the password. Mnemonic words are a human readable format of private keys without encryption. Anyone who has the mnemonic words can access your wallet. For your wallet security, it is recommended that you should write them down on papers or store them on U-disk or hard disk for physical isolation. 

 Ÿ You have a wallet.
 Step 1: Click “Import”
 Step 2: Enter your mnemonic words or scan QR code to import
 Enter your mnemonic words or scan QR code to import your wallet. 
After scanning, you also need to enter your password to complete. When importing your wallet, you can also modify your password.
When you want more tokens in your asset list, click “+” to add tokens. Part of the major tokens will be displayed by default. You can search the tokens you need and add them to the list.
If you forget your trade password, you can import your wallet again by mnemonic words and set your new password.
4.How to use wallet to transfer/receive tokens?

You can choose a token in your asset list and click “transfer” or “receive”. \nTransfer: you can input the recipient’s address by scanning (selecting QR code from your album is available) or entering the address. \nReceive: you can receive tokens by scanning QR code face to face, or share your QR code to your counterparty, or copy your receipt address to your counterparty.
6.How to back up Mnemonic Words, Keystore, Private Key and QR Code?

Mnemonic words are a human readable format of private keys without encryption. Anyone who has the mnemonic words can access your wallet. The following should be noted when using mnemonic words: 
Approach One: 
a) After creating a wallet, please back up your mnemonic words immediately. 
It is recommended to back up your mnemonic words on physical medium, such as writing them down on papers and keep the papers well. Please do NOT take screenshots! 
b) Please guarantee the accuracy of the backup. 
Please keep your mnemonic words well against being stolen or lost. Do NOT send your mnemonic words to anyone! 

Approach Two: 
Being a decentralized wallet, AELF Wallet does not store users’ wallet mnemonic words. Mnemonic words are only stored on the original device through encryption. You back up your mnemonic words by following the instructions. 
“My Account”——Profile photo——Select exporting mnemonic words/Keystore/Private Key/QR Code——Enter trade password——Back up (please keep it well)
The e-mail did not conform with the rules.

Tip: the page you are visiting will jump to a third-party DApp "%1$s" . All actions you do on a third party DApp will be subject to the user agreement and privacy policy of that third party DApp, and %1$s shall be directly and solely liable to you.
Before the wallet application is closed, DApp can automatically complete the whitelist operation without the need to confirm the pop-up window.
Chain %1$s to chain %2$s transfer %3$s in the transformation, please look forward to the release of the new version of AELF

If you need cross-chain transfer, you should modify the receive address suffix to the specified chain ID. \n Example: \n If the address is ELF_addressA_AELF, and now you need to transfer the token to the account of tDVV chain, you have to modify the address to ELF_addressA_tDVV and follow the prompts to complete the subsequent transfer operation.
Forgetting the password will delete all wallet data, you can only recover your identity through mnemonics and private keys, please exercise caution
Are you sure you want to turn off biometrics? After closing, you need to enter the password for each payment
